text: Pierre Beuchot (born 1938) is a French filmmaker. ==Early life== Pierre Beuchot was born in 1938 in Les Pavillons-sous-Bois, near Paris, France.Pierre BEUCHOT, Africultures ==Career== He is a filmmaker. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1938 births Category:People from Seine-Saint-Denis
title: Pierre Beuchot
